titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Simon in the case of Capital Engineering & Mfg. Co. v. Pledger.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/18/1987--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Simon in the case of Capital Engineering & Mfg. Co. v. Pledger.
